meta.description: FogSift Problem Queue - Submissions waiting to be worked on
meta.note: Queue is live. Submit your problem at ko-fi.com/fogsift to join.

queue.problem_summary: SaaS onboarding flow has 60% drop-off rate after the first screen
Podcast has been consistent for 8 months but growth flatlined at 200 downloads/episode
Inventory is tracked in 4 different spreadsheets and nothing matches up
Landing page converts at 0.8% - tried 3 redesigns and nothing moves the needle
E-commerce store getting traffic but cart abandonment is over 80%

completed.problem_summary: Team communication scattered across Slack, email, and texts - nothing gets done
completed.outcome_text: Found 3 quick wins and a deeper workflow issue worth exploring

completed.problem_summary: Always undercharging for freelance design work - no idea what my time is worth
completed.outcome_text: Built a pricing calculator framework she can reuse for every new client

completed.problem_summary: Website loads slowly but hosting provider says everything is fine
completed.outcome_text: Identified unoptimized images and bad caching config, referred to a performance specialist

completed.problem_summary: CI/CD pipeline takes 45 minutes and it's killing team productivity
completed.outcome_text: Found caching opportunities that could cut build time to under 12 minutes

completed.problem_summary: Donor management is chaos - using three tools that don't talk to each other
completed.outcome_text: Mapped out a unified workflow and recommended a single tool migration path

completed.problem_summary: Content calendar falls apart every month - team can't stick to a schedule
completed.outcome_text: Designed a dead-simple 2-week rolling system that removed the bottleneck
